results.name: Guardian Angels (Jose Ignacio Pintado Murillo, Sofía de Vega Giménez)

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 22
  • Processor: 4 cores CPU
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A weak CPU will slow down the AI generation time. The Linux version has been tested on Ubuntu 22
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 22
  • Processor: 4.00GHz CPU - 8 cores
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You will need more than 40 GB if you want to download all the AI. The Linux version has been tested on Ubuntu 22
